title: After Judgment
overview: In a post-apocalyptic world where the sun never sets and no one can die, an ex-priest enlists the help of a rag-tag band of strangers to find the last remaining entrance to paradise. Together the newly formed team enlists on a mission unlike no other to find the only child left on earth. This is their last chance for salvation and time is their greatest challenge as the face numerous obstacles on this one kind of adventure. The end of the world begins again.
